live_updates: This issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience.

60521.summary: Some customers in Kamloops, Vernon & Surrounding Areas of Kelowna are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
60521.title: Apr 27 - Kelowna (Kamloops, Vernon & Surrounding Areas ) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to fully resolve, and services may continue to be intermittent. Thank you for your patience.
Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.

60553.title: Apr 27 - Fort Saskatchewan (SouthFort) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
